title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Plagiarism Prevention Practical Tutorial for Science and Technology Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific research methodology and experience in report writing
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can identify various types of plagiarism and explain classification criteria
Learners can write reports without plagiarism using citation/reference management tools in VR simulations
Learners can propose and apply three or more plagiarism prevention strategies in peer feedback scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
